metadata.title: CVE-2024-41002 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:crypto: hisilicon/sec - Fix memory leak for sec resource releaseThe AIV is one of the SEC resources. When releasing resources,it need to release the AIV resources at the same time.Otherwise, memory leakage occurs.The aiv resource release is added to the sec resource releasefunction.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
